Texts.Chs:
被污染的有毒液体。
被锁链捆绑住的祭品。
谁将会被杀死？
Texts.Eng:
Foul liquids, toxic.
Victims in chain.
One, the lock pick.
Which will be slain?

Texts.Chs: 似乎记录了某些东西的秘密。
Texts.Eng: Seems to be a key of some sort.

Texts.Chs:
两个世界将会陨落，
  回应他们的召唤。
将由你来决定。
Texts.Eng:
Some moons will fall,
  answering the Call.
Balance their mass;
  by twos shalt thou pass.
